backend/main.mo: Defines core data types and storage for salons, bookings, images, and user profiles, with seeding logic and mixins for authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking V26 UI requirements to specific files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries for multiple frontend files describing their purpose, UI behavior, and localization details.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH-derived theme variables for light and dark modes with global background and text rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Minimal wrapper that renders the AppV1 component.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Implements the full V26 QUANTUM REALITY UI including Singularity Loader, hyperâ€‘reality feed, salon cards, interactions, and visual effects.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the AuthHeader component.

frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing access control and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file placeholder for query-related React hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Empty file placeholder for a hook related to salon image handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, CSS variables, dark mode values, scrollbar hiding, and multiple animation keyframes and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Empty page component placeholder for the client dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Empty page component placeholder for the login screen.
frontend/src/pages/ProDashboardPage.tsx: Empty page component placeholder for the professional dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/SalonDetailsPage.tsx: Empty page component placeholder for salon detail view.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing-oriented aura text based on salon data using category, type, tags, and city modifiers.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Empty utility file intended for currency helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, typography, and container queries, referencing CSS variable-based theming.
project_state.json: Describes project version, UX direction, architecture resets, frontend plans, and known issues for the evolving app.
